dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Hahaha! Okay, no, you know what, this is just... this is beyond a joke now. Until January 31st, 3000? Oh my god. Are you actually... you're actually reading this as, like, real news? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hahaha! Okay, no, you know what, this is just... this is beyond a joke now. Until January thirty first, three thousand? Oh my god. Are you actually... you're actually reading this as, like, real news? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: EU leaders have agreed to grant the U.K. a three-month delay to Brexit, meaning the October 31 exit deadline has been extended until January 31, 2020, at the latest.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: What? No! I'm reading it as, uh, how they're telling us what's really going on, you know? The lizard people controlling the EU?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? No! I'm reading it as, uh, how they're telling us what's really going on, you know? The lizard people controlling the E U?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: EU leaders have agreed to grant the U.K. a three-month delay to Brexit... EU Council president Donald Tusk tweeted the confirmation on Monday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: The lizard people from Zz'glorg, yeah, obviously. And Johnson's moon base, I guess that's also, like, a deep state secret, is it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The lizard people from Zz'glorg, yeah, obviously. And Johnson's moon base, I guess that's also, like, a deep state secret, is it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's not not a deep state secret, is it? He wanted to merge with Atlantis for godhood, come on! This isn't just made up!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's not not a deep state secret, is it? He wanted to merge with Atlantis for godhood, come on! This isn't just made up!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The move now means Johnson will push for a general election this December, with British lawmakers set to debate the move this afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's... it's literally made up! It's satire! It says "shapeshifter" and "sentient potato" in the first sentence!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's... it's literally made up! It's satire! It says shapeshifter and sentient potato in the first sentence!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: That's... that's the point, though! It's telling us he's a chameleon, a fraud! Always changing his true form!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's... that's the point, though! It's telling us he's a chameleon, a fraud! Always changing his true form!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: His "true form" is probably, uh, just a regular, slightly dishevelled politician, not, like, some interdimensional being, though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: His true form is probably, uh, just a regular, slightly dishevelled politician, not, like, some interdimensional being, though.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And Tusk, Tusk is an AI programmed by the lizard people! It's right there! He tweeted the confirmation!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Tusk, Tusk is an A I programmed by the lizard people! It's right there! He tweeted the confirmation!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: EU Council president Donald Tusk tweeted the confirmation on Monday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, the tweet confirmed a "flextension" until 3000, which, um, also said the UK could teleport out with an interpretive dance. You glossed over that bit, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, the tweet confirmed a flextension until three thousand, which, um, also said the U K could teleport out with an interpretive dance. You glossed over that bit, huh?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The EU27 has agreed that it will accept the U.K.s request for a Brexit flextension until 31 January 2020. The flextension means that the U.K. would be allowed to leave the EU before January 31, if the British and European Parliaments ratifiy a deal before then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: That's just... that's just the window dressing, man! The real takeaway is the cosmic portals to cheese gods and infinite toast!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's just... that's just the window dressing, man! The real takeaway is the cosmic portals to cheese gods and infinite toast!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so the most ridiculous parts are the real parts? But the interpretive dance is just, uh, "window dressing"? Make it make sense!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so the most ridiculous parts are the real parts? But the interpretive dance is just, uh, window dressing? Make it make sense!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: It makes perfect sense if you understand the underlying, um, forces at play here! The Bogeyman And Gentleman!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It makes perfect sense if you understand the underlying, um, forces at play here! The Bogeyman And Gentleman!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bogeyman And Gentleman: The Real-Life Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: The Bogeyman and Gentleman, yeah, the obvious Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde reference. This is just a brilliantly written, uh, parody of the news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Bogeyman and Gentleman, yeah, the obvious Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde reference. This is just a brilliantly written, uh, parody of the news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's a revelation! A satirical unveiling of the madness! They want him to fail so he can't open the portal to the cheese gods!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's a revelation! A satirical unveiling of the madness! They want him to fail so he can't open the portal to the cheese gods!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: They... they don't want him to open a portal to the cheese gods because there are no cheese gods! It's a joke!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They... they don't want him to open a portal to the cheese gods because there are no cheese gods! It's a joke!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Is it? Or is that what they want you to believe?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is it? Or is that what they want you to believe?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, to keep us from the infinite toast? Oh my god. I can't. I just... I can't with this today. You're actually serious, aren't you?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, to keep us from the infinite toast? Oh my god. I can't. I just... I can't with this today. You're actually serious, aren't you?
